snippet: On March 15, 1965, addressing a joint session of Congress, President Lyndon B. Johnson called for new legislation to guarantee every American's right to vote.
abstract: On March 15, 1965, addressing a joint session of Congress, President Lyndon B. Johnson called for new legislation to guarantee every American's right to vote.

headline.main: March 15, 1965 | President Johnson Calls for Passage of Voting Rights Act
